channel.title: The Weekly Impulse
channel.description: Join Rick Stone as he risks life and limb to give you the truth. Visit www.weeklyimpulse.com for blogs, Rick's Tweets, and of course new episodes.
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Weekly Impulse
channel.itunes:summary: Join Rick Stone as he risks life and limb to give you the truth. Visit www.weeklyimpulse.com for blogs, Rick's Tweets, and of course new episodes.
channel.itunes:author: Micheal J. Crandel & Sentinel Productions
channel.itunes:keywords: the weekly impulse,rick stone,sci-fi,comedy,action,monster,mad scientist,science fiction,fiction

item.title: The Sleepy Little Town
item.description: Rick Stone Travels to the tiny town of Theremin Falls , a town where the entire population has come down with a severe case of sleep walking. Rick has to figure out what's going on and how to stop it,before the entire world becomes a somnambulistic nightmare. This Debut episode of the Weekly Impulse is not to be missed!
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 1 - The Sleepy Little Town
item.itunes:summary: Rick Stone Travels to the tiny town of Theremin Falls , a town where the entire population has come down with a severe case of sleep walking. Rick has to figure out what's going on and how to stop it, before the entire world becomes a somnambulistic nightmare. This Debut episode of the Weekly Impulse is not to be missed!
item.itunes:author: The Weekly Impulse & Sentinel Productions

item.title: The Ghost Trian of Gorgon Gulch
item.description: Join Rick Stone, his Friend and Co-Worker Melissa, and his loyal computer IRIS, as they go out to Gorgon Gulch. In this Dry, Dead Landscape they uncover a deadly secret from the Old West!
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 2 - The Ghost Trian of Gorgon Gulch
item.itunes:summary: Join Rick Stone, his Friend and Co-Worker Melissa, and his loyal computer IRIS, as they go out to Gorgon Gulch. In this Dry, Dead Landscape they uncover a deadly secret from the Old West!
item.itunes:author: Micheal J. Crandell & Sentinel Productions

item.title: Rick Stone Interviews - Sunfflefugus
